# Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)

We performed EDA in two steps:

- **Step 1**: [Preliminary EDA](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/ashirwad.barnwal5453/viz/ist-corrected-eda/ISTEDA) using Tableau story
- **Step 2**: [Detailed EDA](https://ashirwad.github.io/stat599-creative-component/detailed-eda.html) using `dlookr` R package
